sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) The character may take a Disruptive Strike action, making a Lightsaber (Cunning) combat check against one engaged target and adding force dice (white d12) no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend force points to add failures to the target's next combat check made during this encounter.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Disruptive strike</name> <number>TAL0001030</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 22:12:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ae32dbe0dbea0c542901de90cf961941</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 22:12:17</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
